item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

My background in tech began during the Windows and Dot-Com era, based in Manchester UK, studying Advanced IT in college during the mid-90s, then Business IT and Information & Communications at university in the early 2000’s.

After a long hiatus, I returned to web development using modern tools like AI, online resources, and real-world projects to refresh and expand my skills.

item.title: GTF Motor Ltd
item.description:

Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with AI assistance.

item.title: OverTheWire Bandit War Game
item.description:
A personal project documenting my experience completing the OverTheWire Bandit
War Game using basic HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and AI-assisted writing.

item.title: TSWebDev Portfolio Website
item.description:
An intermediate-level project using the open-source static site generator Hugo
to create a responsive and minimalist web developer portfolio.
